item.title: How is Data Science used in the transportation industry?
item.description: The transportation business is responsible for people and products' safe and efficient movement. Analytical capabilities in transportation are being bolstered by advancements in transportation technology such as traffic sensors, electronic access, mobility management, and monitoring display systems
item.dc:creator: theiotacademy

item.title: What is the difference between a Data Engineer and a Data Scientist?
item.description: Big Data and Data Science job responsibilities have expanded and spread out at an unprecedented rate since data became the new currency of the 21st century. For those who want a promising career path, Data Engineer and Data Scientist are two of the best options.
item.dc:creator: theiotacademy

item.title: Explain the role of Big Data and Data Science in the banking sector
item.description: Big Data has been an increasingly popular topic of conversation in recent months. Financial institutions are also using this technology in today's digital environment. Let's take a deeper look at Big Data's role in banking and how it protects customers from cyberattacks and boosts customer satisfaction.
item.dc:creator: theiotacademy

item.title: What is Big Data analytics and why is it important?
item.description: A company's ability to engage with potential clients has never been easier than it is now, thanks to fast improvements in technology.

item.title: What is the growth and career opportunities in Machine Learning in India?
item.description: Machine learning is one of the most acceptable employment options of the 21st century. It's a great place to get a high-paying career. Also, a job in machine learning in India is on its way to revolutionize the automation industry.

item.title: What is CNN? Explain the different layers of CNN
item.description: In 2012, a new Deep Learning algorithm shattered the annual ILSVRC computer vision competition. It's an Alexnet neural network, a convolutional neural network. Convolutional neural networks use a similar process to standard supervised learning methods

item.title: Top Deep Learning interview questions and answers in 2022
item.description: Companies are increasingly searching for experts who can design models to replicate human characteristics. A deep learning engineer's annual income is around $133,580—an In-Depth Look at the Most frequently asked Deep Learning Interview Questions.

item.title: How is The IoT Academy imparting in Anudaksh initiatives?
item.description: ANUDAKSH stands for (Anusandhan, Niyojaniyata, Udyamita, and Dakshta) It is an initiative by IIT Guwahati and Research for Resurgence Foundation Nagpur (RFRF) that aims at upskilling students, faculty members, and working professionals towards Atmanirbhar Bharat

item.title: What are the different types of Cloud Computing?
item.description: In today’s world, everything revolves around technology. Many new terminologies come up every day but a common man cannot easily understand the meaning and its application. One of such things is the “cloud”.

item.title: What is IoT (internet of things) and how does it work?
item.description: The Internet of Things (IoT) is a network of interconnected, internet-connected devices that can gather and send data across a wireless network without the need for human intervention and people. There are several opportunities for personal and professional development.
item.dc:creator: theiotacademy

item.title: How Anudaskh is in line with the government's new education policy?
item.description: The National Education Policy 2020 plans to come up with a dedicated unit for building up the infrastructure for advanced training, digitized content, and capacity building under the MHRD to take care of the online educational needs of individuals, and schools.

item.title: What is Cloud Computing and its applications?

item.title: What are the applications of IoT?
item.description: Connected devices or smart gadgets as they are sometimes referred to, are built in a way that records and exploits every bit of data that you exchange or use in your daily life. To stay in touch with you daily and complete activities, these devices like IoT and Embedded systems will use this data.

item.title: What Are the Biggest Challenges in Digital Marketing That You Need to Know?
